import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import widgetdata from '../../data/widgetdata.json'; class Sidebar extends Component { render() { let imgattr = 'image' let publicUrl = process.env.PUBLIC_URL+'/' let data = widgetdata.latestposts return (

Search

{ data.title }

{ data.items.map( ( item, i ) =>
{ item.title }
  • { item.date }
  • { item.view }
  • { item.comment }
) }

  • Aol
  • Email
  • Aol email 295
  • AOL Mail
  • Aol mail help
  • Aol
  • QuickBooks
  • Mail
  • Accounting
  • Hardware
  • Software
  • Support
  • Network
  • Email
  • Cloud

{ widgetdata.categorywidget.title }

    { widgetdata.categorywidget.items.map( ( item, i )=>
  • { item.cat } ( { item.number } )
    • ) }

{ widgetdata.instagram.title }

    { widgetdata.instagram.firstlist.map( ( item, i )=>
    • ) }
    { widgetdata.instagram.secenditem.map( ( item, i )=>
    • ) }

{ widgetdata.socialicon.title }

    • ) }
); } } export default Sidebar;
